notice.en: For second-year PhD student/ Biomedicine，combine couse:LS6018A
notice.ch: 限生科系博士班二年級，生物醫學組課程，與LS6018A合班上課

remark.ch: 限生科系博士班二年級，生物醫學組課程，與LS6018A合班上課
remark.en: For second-year PhD student/ Biomedicine，combine couse:LS6018A

goal.ch: 透過科學文獻的閱讀、報告與討論強化生命科學專業學識能力
goal.en: Strengthen the professional knowledge of life science through reading, reporting, and discussing scientific literature.

outline.ch: 學生針對科學論文進行專題報告，教師針對報告給予建議必帶領學生針對該主題進行討論
outline.en: Students give presentations on scientific papers. The professor gives the comments and leads the students to discuss the topics.

gradMethod.ch:
1. 口頭報告….. 60％
   a. 導師評分（50％）
   b. 同儕與自我評價（10％）

2. 討論與參與…40％
   a. 在課堂上提問（20％）
   b. 隨堂筆記與心得（問題、評論、回饋…）(20％)
gradMethod.en:
1. Oral presentation….. 60％
       a. Grading by the instructor (50％)
       b. Peer and self-evaluation (10％)

  2. Discussion and participation….. 40％
       a. Ask questions in the class (20％)
       b. Note (questions, comments, feedbacks…)(20％)
